repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:jessie

MAINTAINER Matthew Tonkin - Dunn <mattythebatty@gmail.com>

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN curl -f -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wp-cli/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar > /usr/bin/wp && \
	chmod +x /usr/bin/wp

ENTRYPOINT ["wp"]
CMD ["--info"]
